We also provide consulting services around the following topics.

- Natural language processing, statistics and machine learning, especially as applied to large datasets
- Teaching statistics and programming in educational and research settings
- Artificial intelligence applications, and evaluating AI impact in research and education

Feel free to get in touch to discuss options and prices. 

Past clients include the TLU Baltic Film, Media and Arts School, the University of Tartu, the Estonian Maritime Museum, the National Library of Latvia, the Estonian Qualifications Authority, and companies in e-commerce.
